reviewText:
very engaging video.  Robbie Ventura narrates while riding a criterium with some team mates/disciples just after his Pro career.
It is amazing that he can speak while putting out 900 plus watts.

I absolutely LOVE this video.  I'm an experienced rider, but I could barely hang 15 minutes with these guys!  I do this at least once a week all winter.  I ended up ordering the hill climb video also.
